column1: Staff members from the Federal Reserve, Office of the Comptroller of the Currency, and Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation are working through a major review of regulations called for in the Economic Growth and Regulatory Paperwork Reduction Act  (EGRPRA) .

The Federal Reserve does not use a one -sizefits-all approach to reg ulation and supervision and is  committed to continually reevaluating and improving oversight to meet the complementary goals of bank soundness, financial stability, and economic growth.
